instruction: Eat an apple.
description: Eat an apple as fast as you can.

instruction: Find the number I have in my head.
description: One player of the group thinks to a number, the other groups try to find it.

instruction: Eat 5 mini tomatos.
description: The player eats 5 mini tomatos as fast as he can.

instruction: Recite car brands.
description: Each group quotes car brands, the last group standing wins.

instruction: Tell something about you, others groups guess if it's true or not.
description: Tell us a fun fact about you and others groups have to find if you're a liar or not.

instruction: Do 10 push-ups.
description: Everyone does 10 push-ups.

instruction: The group with the tallest person loses.
description: If you opened this description, you lost too.

instruction: Hold your breath as long as you can.
description: Let's see who's the best swimmer.

instruction: Who's the laziest?
description: Vote for the laziest person.

instruction: You lost. ðŸ˜…
description: Everyone votes to choose who lost this round.

instruction: Find two white objects in the room.
description: Your group has to find 2 white objects and show it to the others.

instruction: Wich group has the most same phone brands?
description: The group with the fewest brands of telephone in common loses.

instruction: If you own a PS5, you won.
description: You won the round too.

instruction: Whisper for the next 5 games.
description: A player speaking to loud loses.

instruction: The smallest group wins.
description: Everyone loses if the groups are the same size.

instruction: Wich group did the most university years?
description: Sum the amount of years of study up. The group with the biggest number won!

instruction: Touch your elbow with your tongue.
description: Daaamn look at that tongue!

instruction: Would you rather lose an arm and a foot or a leg and a hand?
description: Let's vote and we'll see.

instruction: Have you already falsified a signature?
description: You're a bad person.

instruction: If you haven't seen any Harry Potter, you lost.
description: It's never too late.

instruction: Touch the ground with both hands.
description: Last group on the floor loses.

instruction: Recite names.
description: Each player says a name until someone runs out of ideas.

instruction: Guess the color of the master's underwear.
description: The group who found it wins it, or maybe not, you decide.

instruction: Eat 5 olives.
description: One member of your group has to eat 5 olives.

instruction: Tell a funny story about spaghetti.
description: The funniest story wins.

instruction: The last person to take their feet off the ground has loses.
Have you ever had an surgery?
description: You get 1 point if you did, the group with the most points wins.

instruction: Tell us a joke.
description: The best joke wins.

description: Everyone plays, when you lose you stop.

instruction: Find the most capitals, write them down.
description: Every group makes a list, we check afterwards.

instruction: The first one who says a proverb wins.
description: ðŸ˜²

instruction: Every group says a quote, the more interesting wins.
Who is your favorite historical figure?
description: Try to defend it, then everyone votes the coolest.

instruction: For the next 5 rounds, put the verbs at the end of your sentences.
description: If you forget, it's -1.

instruction: Act like a monkey.
description: One member from each group imitates a monkey, the funniest wins.

instruction: Let's do some sit-ups.
description: Sit, then up, then sit, then up, then up, then sit, then wait, then what?
